module.name: DAHDi Config
module.changelog: *13.0.33.6* Fix system.conf and add unit tests *13.0.33.5* More work for FREEPBX-13784 *13.0.33.4* Fix all issues in FREEPBX-13784 *13.0.33.3* Fix signalling on mfc_r2 *13.0.33.2* FREEPBX-13252 not generated properly when using dahdiconfig for MFCR2 signalling *13.0.33.1* #13126 - Fix incorrect dashboard warning of /etc/dahdi/system.conf *13.0.33* Sangoma hardware check *13.0.32* #12989 *13.0.31* Unit tests *13.0.30* Fix issues when theres no Sangoma hardware *13.0.29* Use different parsing method *13.0.28.5* Wording *13.0.28.4* Send output to dev null *13.0.28.3* Install fixes *13.0.28.2* Check for new hardward during startup *13.0.28.1* Chown hook *13.0.27* More bugs and cleanup *13.0.26* Worked through numerous issues with Rob on this *13.0.25* FREEPBX-12968 *13.0.24* Include missing file *13.0.23* Fix broken edit buttons *13.0.22* Finishing touches re: Sangoma Engineering *13.0.21* Fix Wanrouter start *13.0.20* Improvements to Sangoma configurations *13.0.19* More fixes *13.0.18* FREEPBX-12761 *13.0.17* General fixes *13.0.16* FREEPBX-12569 - MFC R2 settings on Dahdi configuration module *13.0.15* FREEPBX-12423 fix display issue *13.0.14* Fix error when writing to Sangoma wanrouter files *13.0.13* FREEPBX-77776 Fix system.conf for multiple analog ranges *13.0.12* If files dont exist then dont try to read them *13.0.11* Dahdi Config should handle missing files better *13.0.10* FREEPBX-11315 *13.0.9* FREEPBX-10859 and FREEPBX-11012 permissions on /dev/* *13.0.8* FREEPBX-11012 *13.0.7* FREEPBX-10898 *13.0.6* Fixes FREEPBX-10941 and FREEPBX-10859 *13.0.5* Remove old bin scripts *13.0.4* Detect and parse WanRouter configurations correctly *13.0.3* Send error output to dev/null *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha3* Fix auto-start for DAHDi *13.0.1alpha2* Update visuals *13.0.1alpha1* Use new console framework for startup
